sentences.sContent: Small blockages or collapses of the canal would choke the intricate irrigation networks.
sentences.sContent_eng: Small blockages or collapses of the canal would choke the intricate irrigation networks.
sentences.sCn: 运河的小堵塞或倒塌都会阻塞整个负责的灌溉网络。

sentences.sContent: In the United States, by contrast, 41% goes for agriculture, almost all of it for irrigation.
sentences.sContent_eng: In the United States, by contrast, 41% goes for agriculture, almost all of it for irrigation.
sentences.sCn: 与之相比，美国全年41%的水投向了农业，并几乎全都用在了灌溉上。

sentences.sContent: Spray irrigation sprinkling water over land to be used for crops. often used to dispose of wastewater from sewage treatment plants.
sentences.sContent_eng: Spray irrigation sprinkling water over land to be used for crops. often used to dispose of wastewater from sewage treatment plants.
sentences.sCn: 喷洒灌溉，喷灌把水喷洒于准备种植作物的土地上。常常使用经过污水厂处理过的废水。

remMethod.val: ir(进入) + rig(水) + ation → 把水引入 → 灌溉
